databaseaccess.interfaces

Interface ICourseNotesDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CourseNotesDao, MockUpDAO

    public interface ICourseNotesDao
    Database access object for coursenotes.
    Author:
    Jorsi Grammens

    • Method Detail

      • addCourseNotes

        int addCourseNotes(int parentID,
                   CourseNotes courseNotes)
            throws ClassicDatabaseException,
                   ClassicNotFoundException
        Adds coursenotes to the database.
        Parameters:
        parentID - Id of the course or lecture the coursenote belongs to.
        courseNotes - Coursenotes to add.
        Returns:
        ID of the added coursenotes.
        Throws:
        ClassicDatabaseException
        ClassicNotFoundException

        courseNotesID - ID of the coursenotes to delete.

        ClassicDatabaseException
